alert.note: Alert for Bibb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 12:26PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Tobesofkee Creek near Macon affecting Bibb County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Tobesofkee Creek near Macon. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and fields along the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on Columbus Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM EDT Monday the stage was 20.3 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 20 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
